department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: F2915-231305 - Multibeam Survey and Tide Gauge Installation - Corridors Around South Hampton Island
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the delivery of processed multibeam bathymetric data for areas in Hudson Bay and the deployment/recovery of tide gauges in the vicinity of identified survey sites. This requirement is being procured under the provision of Supply Arrangement F5129-210001. Only the suppliers who wished to be considered for the Arctic \\& Labrador and in a sea depth of 0-500m will be invited to submit a bid. The following suppliers will be invited to submit a bid: CSR GeoSurveys Ltd.; Dragage Oc\\_e\\ Likelihood Bay Inc.; Fugro Canada Corp.; IIC Technologies Inc.; Seaforth Geosurveys Inc.; SNC-Lavalin Inc.; TetraTech; WSP; and XOCEAN Canada Limited. This procurement is subject to the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

* **Bid Opportunity ID**: WS3904810729-Doc3995913451
* **Title**: Multibeam Survey and Tide Gauge Installation Services
* **Publication Date**: 05/05/2023
* **Bid Closing Date**: 09/06/2023 14:00:00
* **Bid Period**: 35 days

### Bid Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for multibeam survey services to generate bathymetric data for areas in Hudson Bay, as well as the deployment and recovery of tide gauges. This work will be carried out in support of environmental monitoring.

### Key Requirements

* The delivery of processed multibeam bathymetric data
* The deployment and recovery of tide gauges
* Services to be carried out in areas in Hudson Bay with depths ranging from 0-500m

### Bidder Eligibility

Only suppliers who have expressed interest in this opportunity and meet the specified requirements may submit a bid.

### Selected Suppliers

CSR GeoSurveys Ltd.
Dragage Océan DS Inc.
Fugro Canada Corp.
IIC Technologies Inc.
Seaforth Geosurveys Inc.
SNC-Lavalin Inc.
TetraTech
WSP
XOCEAN Canada Limited

### Contracting Entity

* **Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* **City**: Gatineau
* **Province**: Quebec
* **Postal Code**: K1A 0S5
* **Country**: Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Mariam Assal, PSPC/SPAC
* **Email**: mariam.assal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not available
* **Fax**: Not available
